channel.title: [PI] Adding PvP drops
channel.description:
I want to add it like whenever some one kill someone in wildy, he receives some random drops. I got artefacts, just need to know how to add them as a random drop. Help please. I appreciate your help, but don't flame like i got rep -- for asking how to make easter ring working :(. Don't flame now.
[b]My base is Project Insanity.[/b]

item.title: [PI] Adding PvP drops
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

I said something like that.

Not sure if it would work or not, but you would just change the items in the ‘d’ array.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding PvP drops
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:2, topic:365371”]Something like this:

int d[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}; java.util.Random r = new java.util.Random(); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(d[r.nextInt(d.length)], c.getX(), c.getY(), 1); [/quote]
the 1,2,3,4,5 are item ids i need to replace or what? Ty anyways but answer me

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding PvP drops
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

I saw a tutorial for this, for PI. Just not sure if I saw on this forum. You may google it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding PvP drops
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Something like this:

int d[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
java.util.Random r = new java.util.Random();
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(d[r.nextInt(d.length)],  c.getX(), c.getY(), 1);

Read full topic
